website_summaries.verdict: Between its inclusion of 2 heroes and the creepy villain, and how posable each action figure is, this is the ultimate toy set for fans of the “Justice League” film.
cons: The axe uses tiny button batteries, which are included

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I think this set is great. I have one myself, and got one for a dear friend's son. He loved them. The detail especially on Steppenwolf is masterful. Superman and Batman were as I expected. Makes a lovely gift or addition to a collection. Only thing that would have made it better would have been adding Wonder Woman to round out the trio.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Steppenwolf
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I only bought this set for the Steppenwolf figure, but he doesn't disappoint. After Darkseid and possibly the Legion of Doom, We are running out of cool DC villains. I can't wait for the movie!
customer_reviews.author: Jon St

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: If you have kids that love the DCEU Batman and Superman you cannot go wrong with this product but the villain Steppenwolf might not look exactly like the movie version. I really like the different look of Steppenwolf but the kids felt he wasn't recognizable. The only thing that I would caution about is the fact that Steppenwolf's axe lights up every time you swing it so the battery will most likely die out pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jokes

customer_reviews.title: DC heroes
customer_reviews.text: The Batman and Superman are basic like the rest of the Dawn of Justice/Justice league basic movies figures, BUT STeppenwolf is perfectly scaled even for DC Universe classics and Multiverse. He stands as tall as Big Show or Great Khali WWE, maybe taller at 9 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the action figures. Really good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Gnz Liz

customer_reviews.title: Steppenwolf finally here
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them, pretty good quality and price. Steppenwolf is a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is all about superheros and he will be excited to receive this present on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: A of the M's

customer_reviews.title: Great toy combo
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids at Christmas. Was and is still a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Pickerel

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and my 3 year olds enjoy playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: jenjennjennifer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a charity gift for a child in need. They asked for anything Justice league. I could not spend more than $20. When it arrived I was so happy to see this will make this 9 year old very happy for Christmas! Awesome gift for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! Loved steppenwolf and batman and superman are a good size in comparison to him. Way smarter to but than build a figure sets.
customer_reviews.author: saint michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my Justice League movie collection. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Lightning fast shipment and item arrived as described!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service and an awesome product that was in top condition! Thank you; am overly pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice Action Figure Set
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these action figures. The axe lights up and the characters look very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Cool set for the money. The Batman and Superman fit perfectly in the batmobile I purchased on here.
customer_reviews.author: another pretty face

customer_reviews.title: Great action figures
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described and high quality. My son loves them and they've held up nicely after 3 months of playing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Powell

product_meta.title: Mattel Justice League Batman Steppenwolf Superman 3-Pack Figures
product_meta.description: Inspired by the new Justice League movie, this total action battle pack features an oversized Steppenwolf, two key DC Super Hero figures and a light up weapon accessory! Steppenwolf, the immortal villain is intent to take over earth! Batman and Superman must pair up to defeat him. Recreate their epic battles with these highly detailed figures. Each has 14 points of articulation and wears their signature battle gear. The exclusive, oversized Steppenwolf figure also wields a light up Electro-Axe and the Batman and Superman figures have cloth capes and new power suits!
feature_bullets: Complete battle play pack from the new Justice League movie
3 characters with detailed power suits and 14 points of articulation
Batman and Superman come in 6” scale with cloth capes
Exclusive Steppenwolf villain figure is oversized and comes with a light up Electro-Axe accessory
Great gift for DC Justice League fans!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars226 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
